subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Matt Gilroy, a three-time all-American defenseman, earned the award on the eve of Saturday’s N.C.A.A. Division I title game, in which top-seeded Boston University will take on Miami (Ohio).
snippet: Matt Gilroy, a three-time all-American defenseman, earned the award on the eve of Saturday’s N.C.A.A. Division I title game, in which top-seeded Boston University will take on Miami (Ohio).
